title: To Fly with You
overview: Shen Zhengyi, a girl who has loved skating all her life, found her goal after participating in winter sports competitions. Behind her mother's back, she decides to try to enter the Zhu Feng Sports Club to become a professional short track speed skater. Due to the lack of professional training, she faces serious problems, but she still manages to get into the team.With the support of Shao Beisheng from the figure skating team, she overcomes all obstacles and wins the trust of her comrades, becoming the black horse of the competition season.
